content: This is a list of recipients of the [Darjah Utama Nila Utama](/wiki/Darjah_Utama_Nila_Utama), the third most prestigious [national honour](/wiki/Orders,_decorations,_and_medals_of_Singapore) conferred by the [President of Singapore](/wiki/President_of_Singapore). ## Recipients YearGrade (if any)RecipientNotesRef.1990First Class[Prince Jefri Bolkiah](/wiki/Prince_Jefri_Bolkiah)Prince of [Brunei](/wiki/Brunei)[Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye)Former [Deputy Prime Minister of Singapore](/wiki/Deputy_Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)[Ong Pang Boon](/wiki/Ong_Pang_Boon) - Former [Minister of Education](/wiki/Ministry_of_Education_(Singapore)#Ministers) - Former [Minister for Home Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Home_Affairs_(Singapore)#Ministers) [E. W. Barker](/wiki/E._W._Barker) - Former [Minister for National Development](/wiki/Ministry_of_National_Development_(Singapore)#Ministers) - Former [Minister for Law](/wiki/Ministry_of_Law_(Singapore)#Ministers) [Michael Fam](/wiki/Michael_Fam)Chairman, [Mass Rapid Transit Corporation](/wiki/Mass_Rapid_Transit_(Singapore))Second Class[Yong Nyuk Lin](/wiki/Yong_Nyuk_Lin) - Former [Minister of Health](/wiki/Ministry_of_Health_(Singapore)#Ministers) - Former Minister of Education [Jek Yeun Thong](/wiki/Jek_Yeun_Thong)Former [Minister for Labour](/wiki/Ministry_of_Manpower_(Singapore)#Ministers)[Othman Wok](/wiki/Othman_Wok) - Former [Minister for Social Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Digital_Development_and_Information#Ministers) - Former [Minister for Culture](/wiki/Ministry_of_Communications_and_Information#Ministers) [Chua Sian Chin](/wiki/Chua_Sian_Chin)[Advocate](/wiki/Advocate) and [solicitor](/wiki/Solicitor)1991Second Class[Ee Peng Liang](/wiki/Ee_Peng_Liang)President, [Singapore Council of Social Service](/wiki/National_Council_of_Social_Service)2006First Class[Lim Siong Guan](/wiki/Lim_Siong_Guan)Permanent Secretary, [Ministry of Finance](/wiki/Ministry_of_Finance_(Singapore))[Philip Yeo](/wiki/Philip_Yeo)Chairman, [Agency for Science, Technology and Research](/wiki/Agency_for_Science,_Technology_and_Research)2008First Class[Tommy Koh](/wiki/Tommy_Koh) - Ambassador-at-Large, [Ministry of Foreign Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_(Singapore)) - Special contributions for the [Pedra Branca dispute](/wiki/Pedra_Branca_dispute) Second Class[Andrew Chew](/wiki/Andrew_Chew)Chairman, [Public Service Commission](/wiki/Public_Service_Commission_(Singapore))2012First Class[J. Y. Pillay](/wiki/J._Y._Pillay)Chairman, [Council of Presidential Advisers](/wiki/Council_of_Presidential_Advisers)2015First ClassStephen Lee Ching YenImmediate Past President, Singapore National Employers Federation2017First Class[Eddie Teo Chan Seng](/wiki/Eddie_Teo)Chairman, Public Service Commission2019High DistinctionLim Chee OnnMember, Council of Presidential Advisers2021Distinction[Peter Seah Lim Huat](/wiki/Peter_Seah_Lim_Huat) - Chairman, [DBS Bank](/wiki/DBS_Bank) - Chairman, [Laselle College of the Arts](/wiki/Lasalle_College_of_the_Arts) - Chairman, National Wages Council - Chairman, [Singapore Airlines](/wiki/Singapore_Airlines) - Member, Council of Presidential Advisers 2024High Distinction[Peter Ho](/wiki/Peter_Ho_(chairman))Chairman, [Urban Redevelopment Authority](/wiki/Urban_Redevelopment_Authority)2025[Tan Gee Paw](/wiki/Tan_Gee_Paw)Former chairman, [Changi Airport Group](/wiki/Changi_Airport)
title: List of Darjah Utama Nila Utama recipients
